history.proof: unfold Rbar_is_upper_bound, Rbar_is_lower_bound. split. - intros H x Hx. apply Rbar_opp_le. apply H. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rbar_opp_le. scongruence use: Rbar_opp_involutive. - intros H x Hx. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rbar_opp_le,Rbar_le_antisym. apply Rbar_opp_le. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rbar_opp_le,Rbar_le_antisym. apply Rbar_opp_le. apply Rbar_opp_le. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rbar_opp_le,Rbar_le_antisym. apply Rbar_opp_le. hauto use: Rbar_opp_involutive, Rbar_opp_le.

original: intros E l. unfold Rbar_is_upper_bound, Rbar_is_lower_bound. split. - intros H x Hx. apply Rbar_opp_le. apply H. apply Rbar_opp_le in Hx. rewrite Rbar_opp_invol in Hx. auto. - intros H x Hx. apply Rbar_le_antisym. + apply Rbar_opp_le. apply H. apply Rbar_opp_le. auto. + apply Rbar_opp_le. apply H. apply Rbar_opp_le. auto.
